title: Where is the Pixel 5 made? - Quora

response.answer_text: Where is the Pixel 5 made? WEll, I still do not have a Pixel 5 (yet!)… But I took a few minutes to Google around for “Pixel 5 Unboxing videos” … certainly I found a few and I found, at least one, that has a closeup of the Pixel 5 box where it clearly can be read that the Pixel 5 is MADE IN CHINA. Here is the proof:  And here, you can see the full video:
If I have to put my money the Pixel 5 is made in China by Foxconn. The camera is a Sony sensor like the pixel 4a. Display probably Samsung or LG, Storage samsung. 5g obviously Qualcomm.
